sentences.sContent: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.sContent_eng: Without the fungi, this would be just another sandbar.
sentences.sCn: 如果没有真菌，这里将成为另一个沙洲。

sentences.sContent: But without fungi we would not have gardens, houses or even feet at all.
sentences.sContent_eng: But without fungi we would not have gardens, houses or even feet at all.
sentences.sCn: 但是，如果没有真菌，我们就不会有花园、住宅，甚至脚。

sentences.sContent: Some of those carbon products transfer from the roots to symbiotic fungi and soil microbes, which store the carbon in the soil as humus.
sentences.sContent_eng: Some of those carbon products transfer from the roots to symbiotic fungi and soil microbes, which store the carbon in the soil as humus.
sentences.sCn: 这些含碳化合物有部分从根部被共生真菌和土壤中的微生物摄取，最后变成腐殖质储存在土壤里。
